parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> RTD

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns controls trim offset.<template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>afm</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getTrimOffsetRTD''' RTD_helicopter

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> RTD_helicopter: [[Object]] - Helicopter with advanced flight model enabled

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - Offsets in format [x,y,z]

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_array = '''getTrimOffsetRTD''' [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[:Category:Command_Group:_RTD|RTD Commands Group]], [[Advanced Helicopter Flight Model in Arma3]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
